text: "Colonel Homer" is the twentieth episode of the third season of The Simpsons. It first aired on March 26, 1992. In this episode, Homer and Marge leave after he embarrasses her at a movie theater. Later Homer visits a redneck bar, where he comes across Lurleen Lumpkin, a talented singer-songwriter, waiting tables. Homer becomes her manager, not knowing she has fallen in love with him. When Marge grows upset because she suspects Homer is cheating on her, he must remain faithful to her after Lurleen makes romantic advances toward him. == Other websites == * * * Category:1992 television episodes Category:Emmy Award winning programs Category:The Simpsons (season 3) episodes
title: Colonel Homer
